text: The Anthony P. Travisono Intake Service Center is a maximum-security state men's prison in Cranston, Rhode Island, owned and operated by the Rhode Island Department of Corrections. The facility opened in 1985, and has an operational capacity of 1118 prisoners. ==References== ==External links== *Anthony P. Travisono Intake Service Center Category:Prisons in Rhode Island Category:Buildings and structures in Cranston, Rhode Island Category:1985 establishments in Rhode Island
title: Anthony P. Travisono Intake Service Center
